description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. In the footsteps of Evan Wyatt Jr, you are on the hunt for the lost relic of Horus. An adventurous game that happens in the Pyramids. Fight mummies and the guardians of this ancient relic. You will unearth sacred artifacts and of course the great relic of Horus.  Fun filled adventure will drive you till the end.
description.short: In the footsteps of Evan Wyatt Jr, you are on the hunt for the lost relic of Horus. An adventurous game that happens in the Pyramids. Fight mummies and the guardians of this ancient relic. You will unearth sacred artifacts and of course the great relic of Horus.  Fun filled adventure will drive you till the end.
